definition: yuefu (Chinese style of lyric poetry)
happy/cheerful/to laugh
music
surname Le
surname Yue
seat of government/government repository (archive)/official residence/mansion/presidential palace/(honorific) Your home/prefecture (from Tang to Qing times)
Collection of Yuefu Songs and Ballads, compiled in the 11th century by Guo Maoqian 郭茂倩[Guo1 Mao4 qian4]

sentences.english: This explains practical significance of imitative writing in the history of Yue-fu poetry development.
sentences.chinese: 這一創作行爲在樂府詩的發展史上具有重要的意義。

sentences.english: Yue Fu Yuan white, handed down the long poems.
sentences.chinese: 樂府元白體，詩文傳世長。

sentences.english: The second chapter discusses the beginning stage of "the System of Guci in Yuefu".
sentences.chinese: 第二章討論“樂府古辭系統”的初起階段。

sentences.english: And the new subjects created originally by Tang People consist of two types.
sentences.chinese: 唐人完全自創的樂府詩新題目，其方式主要有兩種。

sentences.english: Yuefu folksongs in the South and North Dynasties are of special charm in the history of ancient Chinese folksongs.
sentences.chinese: 南北朝樂府歌辭在中國古代民歌史上具有獨特的魅力。

sentences.english: Yes, it is characterized by a strong sense of reality.
sentences.chinese: 是的，樂府詩的特點就是有強烈的現實感。

sentences.english: The evaluation by afterworld will be retrospected.
sentences.chinese: 並回顧了後世對其樂府詩的評價。

sentences.english: Jindai Lyrics and Zaqu Lyrics are two categories in the book of Yuefu poetry.
sentences.chinese: 近代曲辭與雜曲歌辭是《樂府詩集》中的兩個類別。

sentences.english: Yuefu and Taiyue were two music institutions existing side by side in Qin and Han Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 樂府與太樂是秦漢之際兩大並存的音樂機構。

sentences.english: "Strong Village Books" series with "guest Pavilion verse" roll.
sentences.chinese: 《彊村叢書》輯有《客亭樂府》一捲。

sentences.english: The forth chapter deals with the developing phase of the system of Guci.
sentences.chinese: 第四章討論“樂府古辭系統”的發展階段。

sentences.english: The third chapter discusses the formation of" the system of Guci in Yuefu".
sentences.chinese: 第三章討論“樂府古辭系統”的形成過程。

sentences.english: And their poem creation had studied and inherited many from the folk Yuefu poems of Han dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 他們的樂府詩創作頗多學習和繼承兩漢民間樂府之處。

sentences.english: And their poem creation had studied and inherited many from the folk Yuefu poems of Han dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 他們的樂府詩創作頗多學習和繼承兩漢民間樂府之處。
